TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateDefinition extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerObject

summary.span: 提供设计时在 Web 服务器控件中定义模板元素的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods that define a template element in a Web server control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一个基本模板定义类，可以从和扩展控件设计器，以便在设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）中为模板化控件提供支持。The class provides a base template definition class that can be inherited from and extended for a control designer to use in providing support for templated controls in a design host such as Visual Studio 2005. 设计宿主使用类的属性和方法，以便于 在设计时创建和编辑模板。A design host uses the properties and methods of the class to facilitate creating and editing a template at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生自定义类 。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a custom class from the class. 此控件设计器支持具有四个可能的模板的控件。This control designer supports a control with four possible templates. 若要尝试该方法，请添加对 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用，编译代码，然后在设计宿主（如 Visual Studio 2005）中查看设计视图中的页面。To try it, add a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly, compile the code, and then, in a design host such as Visual Studio 2005, look at the page in Design view. 选择控件，单击 "操作" 列表以选择要修改的模板，然后使用拖放功能将控件移动到模板中。Select the control, click the action list to select a template to modify, and then use the drag-and-drop feature to move controls into the template. [!code-csharp[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/CS/TemplateGroupsSample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DesignerTemplateGroupSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DesignerTemplateGroupSample/VB/TemplateGroupsSample.aspx#2)]
